Package org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class LineBreaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.util.LineBreaker
  • public class LineBreaker
extends Object
    Represents a reader of source text to find end-of-line tokens -- in accordance with StringUtils.STANDARD_EOL -- in order to determine line offsets but discarding line content.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      LineBreaker()

      Calls reset(org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.StreamSource, org.opengrok.indexer.util.ReaderWrapper) with src and null.

      Resets the breaker using the specified inputs.

      • getOffset

        public int getOffset​(int index)
        Gets the starting document character offset of the line at the specified index in the lines list.
        Parameters:
        index - greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to count()
        Returns:
        line starting offset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if index is out of bounds

      • findLineIndex

        public int findLineIndex​(int offset)
        Find the line index for the specified document offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - greater than or equal to zero and less than originalLength().
        Returns:
        -1 if offset is beyond the document bounds; otherwise, a valid index
